text: aur munafiqo ko bhi maaloom kare jin se kaha gaya ke aao Allah ki raah mein jihaad karo, ya kaafiro ko hataao, to wo kehne lage ke agar hum ladaayi jaante hote to zaroor saath dete, wo us din banis-bath imaan ke kufr se bahuth qareeb thein, apne mu se wo baatein banaate hai, jo un ke dilo mein nahi aur Allah taâ€™ala qoob jaanta hai jise wo chupaate hai
